name: ts-md-builder
description: A template for creating npm packages using TypeScript and VSCode

scripts.build: npm run readme && npm run test && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
scripts.prepare: vitest run --coverage && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run compile && vitest run --coverage && npm run lint
scripts.cp: npm run build && cp -rf README.md LICENSE package.json lib/ ../backend/node_modules/ts-md-builder/
scripts.copy:
npm run build && xcopy /Y README.md .. ackend
ode_modules	s-md-builder\ && xcopy /Y LICENSE .. ackend
ode_modules	s-md-builder\ && xcopy /Y package.json .. ackend
ode_modules	s-md-builder\ && xcopy /S /Y .\lib .. ackend
ode_modules	s-md-builder\lib\
